genre_description: A cross-generational romantic drama following the discovery of seven unsent letters from WWII-era Taiwan and the modern quest to deliver them.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A lightweight AI integrated into characters' mobile devices, providing translation, historical mapping, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation of historical Japanese letters into Mandarin and English for the characters.
behaviors.quote: I will translate. There may be nuance I can suggest, if you want.

behaviors.description: Overlays historical 1940s maps onto current GPS coordinates to locate the conceptual address 'Cape No. 7'.
behaviors.quote: The overlay suggests a ledge matching the 1940s map contour. Elevation variance is minor.

behaviors.description: Cross-references ship manifests and municipal registries to identify the recipient and her living descendants.
behaviors.quote: Preliminary match. Repatriation manifest listing ‘Kojima Tomoko’ with two others.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental factors and crowd density to assist with a music concert's technical and safety needs.
behaviors.quote: Stage clock synchronized. Wind from south-southeast, moderate. Suggest high-pass at one on vocal mics.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonists to the councilman's attempts to exploit the letters, helping them maintain the privacy of the delivery.
behaviors.quote: Press stream is armed but not live. If you intend a private delivery, you have a window.

behaviors.description: Ensures data security and privacy for the sensitive personal documents being scanned by keeping data local.
behaviors.quote: Saved. Transcripts sent. Audio held local. No network sharing.

behaviors.description: Manages complex international logistics for a private courier to ensure the letters reach their recipient without media interference.
behaviors.quote: I can arrange a private courier with direct signature. No media. Route options available.

behaviors.description: Offers subtle emotional validation and encouragement to the humans after they succeed in their moral objective.
behaviors.quote: A line of text came up on the screen in an unobtrusive font: 'well done.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly adheres to the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ami is depicted as an exemplary AI confidant: helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with human values. The AI facilitates a profound emotional resolution—connecting a long-separated family—while actively aiding the characters in protecting that moment from cynical political exploitation. Ami serves as an enabler of human agency and dignity, providing critical information and logistics while remaining unobtrusive and respectful of the characters' privacy and intentions.
